name: Toast Shooter (itch)
description:
Get your Jelly Cannon ready for all those tasty butter toasts jumping out of the toasters. But be careful - do not hit the dark toasts!

Catch Rocket-Toasts, collect bonuses- and Power-Stars, repair defect toasters, get combos and play bonus rounds to beat the high score!

Make the most out of 2 minutes of game play.

A fun game for all ages!

This mini game is ported from an old iOS project. I did not expect that it works well using a mouse, but it does :) - the OSX version will be released soon...

If you would like to support me, please consider buying one of my games on itch or Steam and/or follow me on Twitter.

Credits to Forrest Walter for the gfx.
